name: Follower Count Removal for Activity Page
description:
Code removes the Total Follower number on the Activity page. 

NOTE: It also removes the Notes and New Follower number. The button will still appear if you want to specifically check the numbers.
obsoletion_message: It was a test. It doesn't work.
additional_info: Thursday, July 18, 2013 - I'm still trying to figure out how to isolate the Total Follower count on the Activity Page. Currently, the Notes and New Follower count is removed along with the Total Follower count. It does not remove the button or the graph, so each individual section can be checked.
